text: Ani amhi musala grantha pradana kela ani tyancyanantara satata rasula (paigambara) hi pathavile ani amhi mariyama-putra isala spasta nisanya pradana kelya ani pavitra atma (hajarata jibrila) dvare tyanna samarthana dile gele. Parantu jevha jevha tumacyajavala rasula (paigambara) ti gosta ghe'una ale, ji tumacya vicarancya virud'dha hoti, tumhi tatkala ghamenda dakhavili, maga kahinna tumhi khote tharavile ani kahinna jive thara marale
